Description:
V. CRITICAL COMPETENCIES Ability to learn new systems quickly
Ability to help others work more productively through application coaching
Knowledge of EPC systems in engineering design, document management, subcontract management, Construction Management, and commissioning
Strong problem solving and analytical skills
Strong communication skills (written and verbal)
Strong facilitative skills, including presenting to cross cultures and geographies.
Thrives in a fast-paced environment
Understanding of data management, integrity, digitization, and dependencies.
Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts,
Ability to decompose high-level information into actionable details.VI. PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience.
Background in the information management of detailed engineering activities of process plants.
Knowledge of, configuration, and interoperability of engineering and construction tools.
Knowledge of the information flow between the automation tools.
Ability to bring teams together to achieve project targets and goals.
At Air Products, we work in an environment where diversity is essential, inclusion is our culture, and each person knows they belong and matter. To learn more, visit About Air Products.Job Details
